attributes.action: All petitions with over 100k signatures MUST BE DEBATED.
attributes.background:
All the evidence to support this not happening is on this very site. Written responses are not sufficient.

We the people are speaking, You are not listening.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/104933

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
